title: Urban Square: Kohaku no Tsuigeki

alternative_titles.ja: アーバンスクウェア　琥珀の追撃

synopsis:
When hopeful screenwriter Ryou Matsumoto is told that he should write about his own experiences, he believes nobody would want to hear about his uneventful life. However, one evening he witnesses a man get gunned down in an alleyway. After barely escaping from the killer and dealing with unhelpful police, Ryou must channel the hero inside himself if he wants to evade the dangerous group he has accidentally run across.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
